message: Let's split it 50/50 and end the game
I'll give you 400k, but I'm thinking you can do better than that!
I'll give you 400k, but I think I deserve more for being the one to make the next offer
You're getting lowball, I'm trying to be generous, but you need to meet me in the middle!
I'll meet you in the middle, but I'm still getting a better deal than you
You're getting aggressive, but I'm not going to give up yet! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting away with a steal!
I'm not giving up either! I'll give you a better deal, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of
You're getting desperate, and I'm taking advantage of it! You're not leaving me with scraps!
I'm not going down without a fight! I'll give you a better deal, but I'm not giving up my share
You're really pushing your luck, Alice. I'm not going to let you walk away with 80% of the pot!
I'm not going to let you take advantage of me! I'll give you a small share, but I'm keeping the majority
You're not getting any more, Alice. This is the final offer. Take it or leave it!
